name: Magnetic Patchwork
description:
In Magnetic Patchwork 2 players compete in order to repair a rocket. They use magnetic beams and race over the scrap to deliver pieces to the rocket's collector.

The player with the most piece delivered wins. ( 2 controllers are needed )

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick  - Rotate

Left Trigger - Impulse

Right Trigger (Hold) - Magnetize
